# www.geolonia.com

## Project Overview
Corporate website for Geolonia Inc., a Japanese company specializing in location-based technology and open-source solutions.

## Tech Stack
- Framework: Astro 5.x (Static Site Generator)
- Content: Markdown/MDX with Astro Content Collections
- Testing: Cucumber + Playwright (E2E)
- Language: Japanese (Primary), English (Technical docs)

## Key Features
- Dual header design (transparent on home, white on child pages)
- Markdown-based content management
- Comprehensive E2E test coverage
- Responsive design for desktop and mobile

## Directory Structure
- `src/content/pages/` - Markdown content for all pages
- `src/components/` - Reusable Astro components (Header, Footer)
- `src/layouts/` - Layout components (BaseLayout, MarkdownPageLayout)
- `features/` - Cucumber E2E tests

## Content Management
All page content is managed via Markdown files in `src/content/pages/`.
Edit these files to update website content - changes are automatically reflected.

## Development
```bash
npm run dev    # Start dev server (port 8080)
npm test       # Run E2E tests
npm run build  # Build for production
```
